replies.body:
I used "seniors'" in the plural sense because I didn't know who actually appealed him or whether it was a team decision. Try not to be pedantic, it's not an encouraging trait.

Now, I suggest that if you have a problem with the ban, then you take it up with the senior. Don't turn this thread into an argument about the validity or fairness of his being unbanned.

Have a good evening.

Let's let hackers back into avicus!

@Sayah, the part about peer pressure it complete bullshit. Keep lying though my friend. See how that gets you in life.

As I have stated before, very few of the moderating/senior/admin team realised that he was banned, and an even smaller portion questioned it. I don't see how this could be down to bias.
